1750.verse: وَيَقُولُ|And say|80|89|5050$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|108|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|108|59$لَسْتَ|"You are not|103|122|6209$مُرْسَلاً‌ۚ|a Messenger."|113|132|9509$قُلْ|Say,|50|69|765$كَفَىٰ|"Sufficient|88|97|9510$بِٱللَّهِ|(is) Allah|78|88|79$شَهِيدَۢا|(as) a Witness|117|138|8126$بَيْنِى|between me|101|122|5473$وَبَيْنَكُمْ|and between you,|140|161|2965$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|126|1012$عِندَهُۥ|[he] has|80|90|1264$عِلْمُ|knowledge|89|323|9511$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book."|118|352|811$

1754.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|81|46$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|100|1342$مِن|any|50|68|53$رَّسُولٍ|Messenger|90|108|9517$إِلَّا|except|65|84|86$بِلِسَانِ|with the language|139|158|9518$قَوْمِهِۦ|(of) his people|116|125|5784$لِيُبَيِّنَ|so that he might make clear|206|222|3916$لَهُمْ‌ۖ|for them.|81|112|98$فَيُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ|Then Allah lets go astray|186|217|9519$مَن|whom|58|89|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|85|867$وَيَهْدِى|and guides|91|106|276$مَن|whom|58|87|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|103|867$وَهُوَ|And He|67|96|305$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|174|1187$ٱلْحَكِيمُ|the All-Wise.|105|120|343$

1750.verse: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and [the witness of] whoever has knowledge of the Scripture."

1751.verse: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy -

1752.verse: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment

1753.verse: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert [people] from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error.

1754.verse: And We did not send any messenger except [speaking] in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray [thereby] whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

1755.verse: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, [saying], "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
